title: Cursed Compatibility (Seraphine’s Scroll)
summary: Part of the Cursed Hearts & Cosmic Lies system—zodiac pairings doomed to fail.

curse_snark: Sagittarius + Virgo = A guided missile + a to-do list. Spoiler: the list never wins.
Taurus + Aquarius = One wants roots, the other wants to overthrow the soil.
